results.name: default/wordpress-7567d57cf-ljxlx

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-7567d57cf-ljxlx], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-7567d57cf-ljxlx' is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Describe pod with `kubectl describe pod wordpress-7567d57cf-ljxlx` to find issues. 3. Resolve any errors or wait for readiness. 4. Verify service endpoints with `kubectl get endpoints`.
